mapper.insert: insert into block (blockhash, height, time, txSize, size, difficulty, weight, next_block, prev_block, timestamp, received, bits, version, noce, block_reward ) values (#{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{txsize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{nextBlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prevBlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{received,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{noce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blockReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )

mapper.update:
update block
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
txSize = #{txsize,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL},

prev_block = #{prevBlock,jdbcType=CHAR},

bits = #{bits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=CHAR},
noce = #{noce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
block_reward = #{blockReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}

update block set height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, txSize = #{txsize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, next_block = #{nextBlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, prev_block = #{prevBlock,jdbcType=CHAR}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, received = #{received,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bits = #{bits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=CHAR}, noce = #{noce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, block_reward = #{blockReward,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from block order by height desc limit 5
